name: Last on the track
description:
This is a puzzle game in the style of Portal. However in space and without the portals.

Features
  • Full map without loadings
  • Story
  • Game saving
  • 10+ puzzle features

If you are scratching your head and don't know what to do, you can watch walkthrough:

Walkthrough will be uploaded soon

 It is my first game that I have ever published. Enjoy!

Coming soon

Release for Linux + MAC
